Witch Hut.generalText: You arrived at the Witch {}'s Hut.
flavorText: You hear the cry of a strange monster in the distance
The wind howls and the hut sounds a loud creak.

Cave.generalText: You arrived at the cave of {}.
flavorText: The walls of the cave echo with your footsteps.
Your hair blows in the gusts deep inside.

Crypt.generalText: You arrived at the Crypt of {}.
flavorText: The whispers of the past tickle your ear.
You feel uneasy. Like someone is watching you.

Dark Forest.generalText: You arrived at the Dark Forest of {}.
flavorText: You see pairs of eyes in the distant dark.
The trees thrash in the howling wind around you.
You hear a faint but strong voice, "This is my swamp".
The song of frogs and crickets put you at slight ease.
There is a dense fog at the bottom of the canyon.
You here the howl of a coyote that echos across the canyon.
The rocky cliff face makes you very nervous to go near.
You look over the edge to the dark forest below.
You take in ease in the fact you can now rest.
The shopkeep gives you an uneasy look.
